title: Pixel3A Display can b seen bt touch screen not working can't answer call or do any function of scren
content: MY GOOGLE PIXEL 3A PHONE'S SCREEN IS NOT WORKING, I CAN SEE THE DISPLAY BUT I CAN'T SWPIE OR TYPE OR ANSWER CALLS  OR DO ANY FUNCTION AS THE TOUCH SCREEN IS NOT WORKING ALSO FOR UR INFO MY PHONE IS IN WARRENTY PERIOD , PLEASE  PLEASE HELP... THANKS
